reference.shortdesc: Provides detailed information on per-vBucket checkpoint data structure.

section.title: Description
section.p: This command provides detailed information on per-vBucket checkpoint data structure.
section.note: Requesting checkpoint stats impacts the performance and should not be used frequently.
section.p: The identifier for each vBucket statistic begins with the string vb_ followed by the vBucket ID and a colon.

row.entry: Checkpoint ID at which the cursor cursor_name is pointing now.
The seqno at which the cursor cursor_name is pointing now.
Number of times a batch of items have been drained from a checkpoint of cursor_name.
Number of items remaining for the cursor cursor_name.
ID of the current open checkpoint.
Number of total items in a checkpoint data structure.
Number of items in the open checkpoint.
Number of checkpoints in a checkpoint data structure.
Number of items remaining for persistence.
The state of the vBucket for which this checkpoint contains data.
Total memory taken up by items in all checkpoints under given manager.

section.title: Options
section.p: There are no options for this command. For common cbstats options, see .

section.title: Example
section.codeblock: cbstats localhost:11210 -u Administrator -p password -b beer-sample checkpoint
